3: Celestial! I am back with the tear of Mr. Big Fish!
It's good that you got the tear. But why did you also bring back so many toys and snacks... gulp.
Um... Because I met Mr. Guide at the bottom of the mountain. I mean, he used to be a tour guide, but is running a shop now.
He just had to give me them.
Without further ado, let's start making the elixir!
Strychnine, senna, cocklebur and lotus seeds.
Is this a spell for making the elixir? It sounds like a song.
Finally, tear of Big Fish... Ready!
The celestial makes a finger snap. The pot cooking the elixir suddenly shines brilliantly, shooting all the way to the clouds. The light lasts a few seconds before disappearing.
Tsk, I knew I shouldn't trust the specials. This torch only lasted a few seconds.
Is this small black ball... the elixir?
Correct. It may not taste good, but it can heal any disease.
Phew... Finally, I can cure Master's disease.
Yeah. Maybe this is fate's reward for your hard work.
Now, it's time for those who travel far away from home to come back.
